page.title: 18Transport in Gwyddelwern
page.content: {Gwyddelwern}is situated on the Corwen, Ruthin, Denbigh public transport route. The{buses}run from 8.15 in the morning until{six at night.}There are approximately six buses a day in each direction, on week days. There are no buses on Sundays. There is a{school {bus}which provides transport to the local comprehensive schools at Ruthin and Bala during the school term. The primary school children who are entitled to transport are carried by a {minibus}provided by the local garage. Dr. Betty Gibbs.
